mapper.sql: SELECT job.JOB_NAME AS `name`, job.JOB_GROUP AS `group`, job.DESCRIPTION AS description, cron.CRON_EXPRESSION AS cron, tri.TRIGGER_STATE AS state FROM qrtz_job_details AS job LEFT JOIN qrtz_triggers AS tri ON job.JOB_NAME = tri.JOB_NAME AND job.JOB_GROUP = tri.JOB_GROUP LEFT JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers AS cron ON cron.TRIGGER_NAME = tri.TRIGGER_NAME AND cron.TRIGGER_GROUP= tri.JOB_GROUP
